reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the best product ever when it comes to shaving. I hate that it takes forever to arrive at my house so I buy this in bulk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shave cream
reviews.reviewText: Great shave with this stuff. Impossible to find on any shelves in the US. I stocked up in Greece recently. This is a great product. Anything Nivea is a good thing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better and More Convenient Than A Can
reviews.reviewText: While you do require a brush in order to create a nice lather, the thickness of the lather, the penetration of the lather on the skin and on the hairs, and the even and penetrating application of the lather is so much better than using a can and your hand. With this product and a brush you can really form a nice thick lather and then spread it well onto your face. Also, being about the size of a tube of toothpaste this is much easier to pack and carry through airport security with the liquid limitations, especially when compared to even a small can of shaving cream and will last so much longer. I switched to this shaving cream years ago and dont plan on changing back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good cream not so great tube
reviews.reviewText: The tube has a threaded cap with fine threads. With the cream on your hand, it's hard to hold onto and then replace the cap. I replaced it with a product that has a snap cap that stays attached to the tube.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nica and satisfactory
reviews.reviewText: Just what I wanted. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Enables razor to glide without "over-protecting"...
reviews.reviewText: If you're less than 100-percent satisfied with your current brand of shaving soap/creme, definitely try Nivea Men Original. This is the best shaving cream I've found in many years of searching.The key is that it enables the razor to glide over my skin while not "over-protecting". All shave creams are formulated to enable a razor to glide over skin while preventing razor drag or burn. The problem with almost all of them in my experience is that they do too good a job of protecting: I end up with what I call "micro-stubble" that I need to remove after wet shaving by putting some hand lotion on my beard area and finishing the job.Nivea Men Original doesn't over-protect. At the same time it does a superlative job of eliminating razor drag and razor burn. I don't have a heavy beard. I can but suspect that those with heavier beards will like Nivea Men Original even more than I do.So if I like it that much, why not five stars? A minor annoyance is that the top of the tube must be screwed off and back on. That can sometimes be a bit annoying. A fifth start awaits a flip-top...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I will use nothing else
reviews.reviewText: I used to use Palmolive's shave cream, which they stopped making when they realized it didn't make them enough money. (A $4 tube of cream would last me a whole year) I was really bummed when I had to go back to canned shaving cream. Then I found out about this Nivea shave cream. Its a little more expensive but I still get about a year out of a single tube, shaving mostly every day. I wouldn't go back to canned shaving cream again. When circumstances have made me use the canned stuff, I can feel the difference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Shave Cream in the Market
reviews.reviewText: If you are thinking about a Shave Cream, this is the best option on the market!! Also, great customer service and follow-up after your product is delievered. I highly recommend this product and seller! Cheers

reviews.reviewerName: ストラトキャスター弾き
reviews.reviewText: 髭の濃い・固い方はコイツ一択と思います。3個売りが安いときは迷わず買いです。
